incidents.description: I am unable to connect to the email server. It appears to be down.
incidents.comments:
2016-12-13 12:30:14 - Joe Employee (Additional comments)
Hi David, 
That must be it. I was on phone calls at all three of those times and must not have had any activity on my computer. Please close this incident.

2016-12-13 10:42:25 - David Loo (Additional comments)
Hi Joe,
I've checked in network logs and you were timed out from the VPN at 9:25AM, 10:42AM and 2:28PM. These three times coincide with entries in the exchange server logs showing you lost connection at those same times. The VPN policy is to time out a connection if it hasn't been active in 30 minutes. Please ensure the next time you lose connectivity you are still connected to the VPN.

I'm going to update this incident to resolved. Please let me know if you need any more assistance.

2016-12-13 07:53:01 - Joe Employee (Additional comments)
Hi David,
Thank you! I use the corporate VPN and was also unable to connect to the email server at 9:30AM and 10:45AM.

2016-12-13 06:43:17 - David Loo (Additional comments)
Hi Joe,
My name is David. I'll be assisting you with this incident. Can you confirm which VPN you have been using today? I also see you were having this issue at 2:30PM. Were there any other times you can recall you had issues connecting to the email?

2016-12-12 16:56:57 - Beth Anglin (Additional comments)
Hi Joe, 
As per discussion on call, Workaround has been provided and it has worked for you. I have verified with the Exchange team we haven't had an issue with the email server today. I'm going to assign this issue to the network team for further investigation.

2016-12-12 12:43:50 - Joe Employee (Additional comments)
Hi Beth,
Yes, I'm connected to the VPN, although I've had to reconnect to it a couple of times. The last time I was unable to connect was 2:30PM.

2016-12-12 10:52:42 - Beth Anglin (Additional comments)
Hi Joe, 
Are you connected to the VPN when you're having this issue? Can you identify a specific time you were unable to connect to email?

2016-12-12 08:30:49 - Beth Anglin (Additional comments)
Hi Joe, 
My name is Beth and I'll be assisting you with your issue.

2016-12-12 07:19:57 - Joe Employee (Additional comments)
I am unable to connect to the email server. It appears to be down.
incidents.work_notes:
2016-12-12 16:56:57 - Beth Anglin (Work notes)
Updating priority as workaround for incident has been provided.

2016-12-12 09:57:00 - Beth Anglin (Work notes)
Increasing priority as this incident is affecting more number of users

2016-12-12 09:01:24 - Beth Anglin (Work notes)
Updating incident with correct Configuration item

      "script": "var VAUtils = Class.create();\nVAUtils.prototype = {\n    initialize: function() {\n    },\n\n\t/* similar validation we do in attachments_util.js for platform and portal */\n\tvalidateAttachment: function(file, field) {\n\t\tif (field.allowedFileSize) {\n\t\t\tvar attrMaxSize = parseInt(field.allowedFileSize);\n\t\t\tvar allowedSizeInBytes = attrMaxSize * 1048576; // 1048576 -> MB_TO_BYTES\n\t\t\tif (file.size > allowedSizeInBytes)\n\t\t\t\treturn { type : 'failure', message: gs.getMessage('The size of the uploaded file cannot exceed {0} MB', field.allowedFileSize) };\n\t\t}\n\t\tif (Array.isArray(field.allowedExtensions) && field.allowedExtensions.length) {\n\t\t\tvar dot = file.name.lastIndexOf('.') + 1;\n\t\t\tvar suffix = file.name.substring(dot).toLowerCase();\n\t\t\tfor (var i = 0; i < field.allowedExtensions.length; i++) {\n\t\t\t\tif (suffix === field.allowedExtensions[i].toLowerCase())\n\t\t\t\t\treturn { type : 'success' };\n\t\t\t}\n\t\t\treturn { type : 'failure', message: gs.getMessage('The uploaded file type is not permitted; allowed types are {0}', field.allowedExtensions.toString()) };\n\t\t}\n\t\treturn { type : 'success' };\n\t},\n\t\n\tisValidEmail: function(email) {\n\t\tvar regex = new RegExp(\"([a-zA-Z0-9_\\\\-\\\\.]+)@([a-zA-Z0-9_\\\\-\\\\.]+)\\.([a-zA-Z]{2,5})\");\n\t\treturn regex.test(email);\n\t},\n\t\n\t\n\tisValidURL: function(url) {\n\t\tvar regex = new RegExp(\"(((ftp|http|https):\\/\\/)|(www\\.))([-\\w\\.\\/#$\\?=+@&%_:;]+)\");\n\t\treturn regex.test(url);\n\t},\n\t\n\t\n\tisValidIPAddress: function(ip) {\n\t\treturn (SncIPAddressV4.get(ip) || SncIPAddressV6.get(ip));\n\t},\n\n    type: 'VAUtils'\n};",

      "script": "var EmailClientRecipientListHandlerSNC = Class.create();\nEmailClientRecipientListHandlerSNC.prototype = {\n    initialize: function() {},\n\n\t/*\n\t * Checks if event is related to recipient list resolution\n\t */\n    isRecipientListEvent: function(event) {\n        var recipientDetails;\n\n        try {\n            recipientDetails = JSON.parse(event.parm1 + '');\n        } catch (err) {\n            gs.error(\"EmailClientRecipientListHandlerSNC: Invalid event parm1 passed\");\n            return false;\n        }\n\n\n        if (!recipientDetails.recipientItemSysID || !recipientDetails.recipientTable || !recipientDetails.emailSysID) {\n            gs.error(\"EmailClientRecipientListHandlerSNC: Required event params are not provided\");\n            return false;\n        } else if (recipientDetails.recipientTable === \"sn_publications_recipients_list\") {\n            var recipientListGr = this.getRecipientListGr(recipientDetails.recipientItemSysID);\n            if (recipientListGr)\n                return true;\n        }\n\n        return false;\n    },\n\n    getRecipientListGr: function(sysId) {\n        var recipientListGr = new GlideRecord(\"sn_publications_recipients_list\");\n        if(recipientListGr.get(sysId));\n\t\t\treturn recipientListGr;\n    },\n\t\n\tgetEmailGr: function(sysId) {\n\t\tvar emailGr = new GlideRecord(\"sys_email\");\n        if(emailGr.get(sysId));\n\t\t\treturn emailGr;\n\t},\n\t\n\tgetEmailIDs: function(userList) {\n\t\tvar emailIDs = [];\n\t\tfor (var i = 0; i < userList.length; i++) {\n\t\t\tvar gUser = new GlideRecord('sys_user');\n\t\t\tif (gUser.get(userList[i])) {\n\t\t\t\tvar email = gUser.getValue('email');\n\t\t\t\tif (email)\n\t\t\t\t\temailIDs.push(email);\n\t\t\t}\n\t\t}\n\t\treturn emailIDs;\n\t},\n\t\n\t\n\n    type: 'EmailClientRecipientListHandlerSNC'\n};",
